ygData.subject: Re: Destrons return home
ygData.msgSnippet: Battera:: She smiled and followed CyberShark. Well, I hope he doesn t try to get you hurt. Or he ll have to answer to me. ... his control room and Cerberus

Battera::

She smiled and followed CyberShark. "Well, I hope he doesn't try to 
get you hurt. Or he'll have to answer to me."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::The Destrons::
> 
>     They reached the base and all went inside. Magmatron went to 
his control room and Cerberus followed him. There he confronts 
Magmatron.
>     "What do you think you are doing?" He says grabbing Magmatron 
by the throat. Magmatron stands up, and Cerberus is hanging from him.
>     "I am simply ensuring the survival of the Destrons," He said. 
Then he grabbed Cerberus and threw him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Jynx saw the swan bot land, he rushed out and grabbed the swan by 
the neck. He ran him to the lab, knowing that Magmatron would want 
him to be Destron.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Dachande took Battera by the hand. "He can only control me in Beast 
Mode, which really stinks."
>     He led her to their Quarters.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Four Nightmares went and started to pratice fighting styles in 
the combat room.
